value.title: Baidu Wins Commercial Licence for Driverless Taxis in Shenzhen

value.title: Tesla driver hits a dog, claim they were on Full Self-Driving Beta
value.excerpt: A Tesla driver hit and killed a dog. They claimed they were driving using Full Self-Driving (FSD) Beta. Full Self-Driving (FSD) Beta is a driver-assist system that takes over all the tasks related to driving a vehicle, but Tesla requires that drivers keep their hands on the steering wheel and pay attention at all times.
